mapper.select: SELECT tbpic.id ,tbpic.tbboard_id ,tbpic.content ,tbpic.type ,tbpic.deleted ,tbpic.created_at ,tbpic.modified_at FROM tbpic WHERE tbpic.id = #{id}

SELECT tbpic.id ,tbpic.tbboard_id ,tbpic.content ,tbpic.type ,tbpic.deleted ,tbpic.created_at ,tbpic.modified_at FROM tbpic WHERE tbpic.id is not null AND tbpic.tbboard_id = #{tbboard_id} AND tbpic.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND tbpic.type = #{type} AND tbpic.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY tbpic.created_at ASC

SELECT tbpic.id ,tbpic.tbboard_id ,tbpic.content ,tbpic.deleted ,tbpic.created_at ,tbpic.modified_at FROM tbpic WHERE tbpic.id is not null AND tbpic.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbpic.created_at AND tbpic.tbboard_id = #{tbboard_id} AND tbpic.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND tbpic.type = #{type} AND tbpic.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY tbpic.created_at ORDER BY tbpic.tbboard_id ASC DESC LIMIT #{callpage}, #{perpage}
